description:
In our advanced Access course you will learn how to use Access efficiently for your daily work.

We explain how to use special controls and subforms to allow a comfortable and clear data maintenance. Additionally we will show you how to create queries and how to include parameters, filter criteria, formulas and expressions in queries in order to perform various tasks. Learn how to create reports and how to analyze your data using Pivot Tables. Course

Use the videos and sample files to follow the course.

Duration: 11 - 18 hours
title: Learn Microsoft Access 2010 -The Ultimate Advanced Training-
instructors: LernFilme.com High quality video trainings for workplace learning. LernFilme.com
